name: Kingakalka
description: He wears an ancient war mask handed down by generations of kings it resembles a Yian Garuga's head painted red and adorned with golden/silver scales.

name: Shaku
description: A Shakalaka who is always willing to help. He is a head taller than other shakalakas and wears a standard shakalaka mask.

name: NONE
description: NOT CURRENTLY HERE
An old and weak looking Shakalaka who is respnsible for the general 'store'. He has toadstools growing on his mask in place of the hair.
A generally old looking shakalaka who always smells of tea.

name: Spearo
description: Wields a golden spear and rarely speaks. He has served king Kingakalka since before his ascension to the Throne.

name: Speara
description: Spearo's nephew who is completely incapable at using weapons but can at least lead troops capably and is a good strategist.

name: Speary
description: Spearo's niece and a near suicidally brave with complete faith in the Shakalakas and their ability to fight.

name: Glaivka
description: The oldest member of the King's guard and a great teacher. However he lacks in 'ambition' and is content with serving as a simple foot soldier.

name: Glaivenous
description: A particularly unhinginged individual among Shakalaka. He once glimsed a Glavenous and has an obsession with Glavenous of all kinds.

name: Poissolaka
description: Wears a fish looking mask and wields a fierce knowledge of all things poisons and toxins.

name: Spearaga
description: She is an avid spear dual wielder and has special spear crossbow able to unleash a barrage of 5 at a single target.

name: Boom Shakalaka
description: Explosives expert of the Shakalaka with some magical bardic skills. Is notable as he permanently has singed hair/skin/mask and clothing...

name: Hamerakalaka
description: A shakalaka well known in the village for being a bad fighter but an exeptional weaponsmith. He wears a generic mask and wields a hammer.

name: Guardakalaka
description: A slightly taller shakalaka that likes to use a blowgun. He stands at the foot of the bridge each day most of the day.

name: Gunna
description: Wearing a reasonably ornate mask the captain is a bizzarely voilent Shakalaka (even by Shakalaka standards) who wields a lightest bowgun.

name: Scarkalaka
description: A bizzarely scarred Shakalaka who loves to hide in bushes and perform ambushes. Wields a blood red swaxe style weapon.

name: Brickalaka
description: The latest in the presdigious Brick lane line. Wielder of the dual tonfas (golden bricks).

name: Medakalaka
description: Speaks in a very un-shakalakan accent (German) while wirelding a glowing spear-flute capable of healing people it is pointed at.

name: Meryka Curaga (Berry)
description: The kindest and most supportive shakalaka in the village. A master of all baking arts and a good chef who wields the sharpest longsword known to skalaka.

name: Semi-Zenny
description: The only Shakalaka to have a pipe installed in his helmet. He has a constant aroma around him and is perpetually covered in smoke.

name: Spook Garon
description: An Odogaron who for some reason knows viscious mockery and also smokes with Semi-Zenny regularly.
